Articles.Content:
This is making me feel a bit like I'm going mad. I've just reinstalled KSP and installed a whole tonne of mods, and for the most part it's all working fine, but I'm being haunted by the most horrible noise in the VAB/SPH editor, and I can't for the life of me work out what's causing it.

It seems to happen whenever I'm trying to attach a part with symmetry, as soon as I hover over the craft such that the new symmetrical pieces are ready to attach, the game makes this beeping noise as well as a really loud, rumbling vibration sound - it's like a mobile phone going off.

I didn't think I'd installed anything that should do that, i can't imagine why any mod should do that, i've been through all the game settings and mod settings and toolbar options with a fine toothcomb and I can't find anything that seems like it could be doing that. And it's so annoying!

Does anyone have any idea what it could be???

Mod list exported from CKAN is as follows:

Spoiler

Edited December 18, 2021 by baldamundo
Please fix the horrible formatting of that mod list, it appears as black text on a very dark grey background and I can't read it at all.

12 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

Please fix the horrible formatting of that mod list, it appears as black text on a very dark grey background and I can't read it at all.

It displays normally for me - it's just copied and pasted from a text file, so no idea why they formatting should be different

49 minutes ago, baldamundo said:

It displays normally for me - it's just copied and pasted from a text file, so no idea why they formatting should be different

All your quotes/spoiler tabs are showing up as black text on a black background for me. What OS and browser are you using? Try pasting without formatting next time?

1 hour ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

All your quotes/spoiler tabs are showing up as black text on a black background for me. What OS and browser are you using? Try pasting without formatting next time?

Just Windows and Firefox. Conceivably could be something weird from copy & pasting into and out of dark mode, i guess? Have edited the post with the text pasted without formatting from a blank notepad, so if it's not working now, i don't know what's going on - can't see that the forum even has an option to change the background colour!

If not, I'll just paste the list here outside of quotes instead, I guess:
